movies.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
movies.description: John Wick embarks on a relentless mission to defeat his enemies, showcasing intense combat and action sequences.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
movies.description: The Guardians face new challenges while keeping their humor and heart intact in a colorful and action-packed adventure.

movies.title: The Whale
movies.description: A deeply emotional drama about a reclusive English teacher attempting to reconnect with his estranged daughter.

movies.title: Scream VI
movies.description: The latest chapter in the *Scream* franchise, continuing the blood-chilling slasher story with new twists and turns.

movies.title: Dune: Part Two
movies.description: The epic continuation of *Dune*, following the struggles of Paul Atreides in a brutal desert world filled with political intrigue and survival.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible â€“ Dead Reckoning Part One
movies.description: Ethan Hunt takes on impossible missions in this action-packed thriller full of espionage, stunts, and high stakes.

movies.title: The Last Letter from Your Lover
movies.description: A heartfelt romance exploring two love stories separated by time, revolving around love letters from a forbidden affair.

movies.title: Letters to Juliet
movies.description: A romantic comedy-drama film based on a book about letters to Shakespeare's Juliet. Sophie, a fact checker, answers a 50-year-old letter and helps a woman find her long-lost love in Verona.

movies.title: The Box
movies.description: The Box is a 2009 American science-fiction thriller film written and directed by Richard Kelly, who also serves as a co-producer. It is based on the 1970 short story "Button, Button" by Richard Matheson, which was previously adapted into an episode of The Twilight Zone.

movies.title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters (2013)
movies.description: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters: Directed by Tommy Wirkola. With Jeremy Renner, Gemma Arterton, Famke Janssen, Pihla Viitala. Brother/sister duo Hansel and Gretel are professional witch-hunters who help innocent villagers. One day they stumble upon a case that could hold the key to their past.

movies.title: Deadpool & Wolverine
movies.description: Deadpool is offered a place in the Marvel Cinematic Universe by the Time Variance Authority, but instead recruits a variant of Wolverine to save his universe from extinction.

movies.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
movies.description: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire: Directed by Gil Kenan. With Paul Rudd, Carrie Coon, Finn Wolfhard, Mckenna Grace. When the discovery of an ancient artifact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must join forces to protect their home and save the world from a second ice age.

movies.title: Oz: The Great and Powerful
movies.description: Oz the Great and Powerful is a 2013 American fantasy adventure film directed by Sam Raimi and written by David Lindsay-Abaire and Mitchell Kapner from a story by Kapner.
